ValidationRule.description: Opportunity must be in the stage Qualifying Opportunity if the Stage 0 - Exploration checkbox is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $CustomMetadata.Bypass_Settings__mdt.Validation.Opportunity__c = FALSE, $Permission.Bypass_Validation_Rules_Global = FALSE, Stage_0_Exploration__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Qualifying Opportunity')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Deal Lost')), OR( ISCHANGED(Stage_0_Exploration__c), ISCHANGED(StageName)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To move past 'Stage 1 - Qualifying', please uncheck 'Stage 0 - Exploration' checkbox.
